Choose Your Module\n\n| Module | Use When |\n|--------|----------|\n| VoiceOS | Android accessibility, voice commands |\n| AVA | AI assistant logic, cross-platform |\n| WebAvanue | Web dashboard, management UI |\n| Cockpit | Module management, configuration |\n| NLU | Intent recognition, entity extraction |\n\n### 2. Check Registries First\n\nBefore creating files:\n```bash\n# Root-level registry\ncat .ideacode/registries/MODULE-REGISTRY.md\n\n# Module-specific registry\ncat Modules/{Module}/.ideacode/registries/FOLDER-REGISTRY.md\ncat Modules/{Module}/.ideacode/registries/FILE-REGISTRY.md\n```\n\n### 3. Read Module Instructions\n\n```bash\ncat Modules/{Module}/.claude/CLAUDE.md\n```\n\n### 4. Follow File Naming\n\n| Type | Pattern | Example |\n|------|---------|---------|\n| Living Docs | `LD-{MOD}-{Desc}-V#.md` | `LD-VOS-Feature-V1.md` |\n| Specs | `{MOD}-Spec-{Feature}-YDDMM-V#.md` | `VOS-Spec-Voice-51215-V1.md` |\n| Plans | `{MOD}-Plan-{Feature}-YDDMM-V#.md` | `VOS-Plan-Voice-51215-V1.md` |\n\n**Module Codes:**\n- VOS = VoiceOS\n- AVA = AVA\n- WEB = WebAvanue\n- CPT = Cockpit\n- NLU = NLU\n- NAV = NewAvanues (root)\n\n---\n\n## Building\n\n### Android (VoiceOS)\n\n```bash\ncd /Volumes/M-Drive/Coding/NewAvanues\n./gradlew :Modules:VoiceOS:apps:VoiceOSCore:assembleDebug\n```\n\n### Web (WebAvanue)\n\n```bash\ncd /Volumes/M-Drive/Coding/NewAvanues/Modules/WebAvanue\nnpm install\nnpm run build\n```\n\n### NLU\n\n```bash\ncd /Volumes/M-Drive/Coding/NewAvanues/Modules/NLU\npython3 -m venv venv\nsource venv/bin/activate\npip install -r requirements.txt\n```\n\n---\n\n## Testing\n\n### Unit Tests\n\n```bash\n# VoiceOS\n./gradlew :Modules:VoiceOS:core:database:test\n\n# WebAvanue\ncd Modules/WebAvanue && npm test\n```\n\n### Integration Tests\n\nSee module-specific living docs for integration test procedures.\n\n---\n\n## Configuration Files\n\nAll configuration uses **IDC format** (v12.0.0):\n\n| File | Location | Purpose |\n|------|----------|---------|\n| Root Config | `.ideacode/config.idc` | Monorepo configuration |\n| Settings | `.claude/settings.idc` | Claude settings |\n| MCP | `.claude/mcp.idc` | MCP server config |\n| Module Config | `Modules/{Module}/.ideacode/config.idc` | Module-specific config |\n\n**Never use JSON for IDEACODE configs** - always use IDC format.\n\n---\n\n## Documentation Locations\n\n| Type | Location | Example |\n|------|----------|---------|\n| Living Docs | `Docs/{Module}/LivingDocs/` | `Docs/VoiceOS/LivingDocs/LD-VOS-*-V1.md` |\n| Registries | `Modules/{Module}/.ideacode/registries/` | `FOLDER-REGISTRY.md` |\n| Project Info | `docs/project-info/` | `API-CONTRACTS.md` |\n| Context Saves | `contextsave/` | `con-nav-voiceos-feature-20251215.md` |\n\n---\n\n## Code Standards\n\n### Kotlin\n- Use `PascalCase` for classes\n- Use `camelCase` for functions/variables\n- Follow SOLID principles\n- 90%+ test coverage for business logic\n\n### TypeScript/React\n- Use `PascalCase` for components\n- Use `camelCase` for functions/variables\n- Use hooks for state management\n- PropTypes or TypeScript types required\n\n### Python\n- Follow PEP 8\n- Use type hints\n- Document all public functions\n- 90%+ test coverage for models\n\n---\n\n## Cross-Module Work\n\n**Before making changes that affect multiple modules:**\n\n1. Check `CROSS-MODULE-DEPENDENCIES.md`\n2. Ask user for approval\n3. Test in all affected modules\n4. Update API contracts\n5. Document in all relevant living docs\n\n---\n\n## Common Commands\n\n### Git\n\n```bash\ngit status                    # Check status\ngit add .                     # Stage changes\ngit commit -m \"message\"       # Commit\ngit push                      # Push to remote\n```\n\n### Gradle\n\n```bash\n./gradlew tasks               # List tasks\n./gradlew clean               # Clean build\n./gradlew build               # Full build\n```\n\n### ADB (Android)\n\n```bash\nadb devices                   # List devices\nadb install app.apk           # Install APK\nadb logcat                    # View logs\n```\n\n---\n\n## Troubleshooting\n\n### Build Fails\n\n1. Clean build: `./gradlew clean`\n2. Check Java version: `java -version` (should be 17+)\n3. Invalidate caches in IDE\n\n### Tests Fail\n\n1. Check test coverage threshold (90%+)\n2. LD-NAV-Core-Architecture-V1\n\n**Living Document** | NewAvanues Core Architecture\n**Version:** 1.0 | **Created:** 2025-12-15 | **Status:** Active\n\n---\n\n## System Overview\n\nNewAvanues is a monorepo containing multiple interconnected modules providing voice-first, AI-assisted experiences across Android, iOS, and web platforms.\n\n### Architecture Principles\n\n1. **Voice-First Design** - All interactions prioritize voice input\n2. **Cross-Platform Consistency** - Shared business logic via Kotlin Multiplatform\n3. **Module Independence** - Modules can function standalone\n4. **Centralized Management** - Cockpit provides unified control\n\n---\n\n## Module Architecture\n\n```\n\n                          Cockpit                             \n                   (Management Dashboard)                     \n\n                                                \n                     \n        VoiceOS                             AVA        \n      (Android App)    (AI Assistant) \n                     \n                                                \n                                \n              WebAvanue    \n                            (Web App)   \n                          \n                                 \n                          \n                               NLU      \n                           (ML Service) \n                          \n                                 \n                          \n                              Common    \n                            (Libraries) \n                          \n```\n\n---\n\n## Module Responsibilities\n\n| Module | Primary Function | Platform | Key Technologies |\n|--------|------------------|----------|------------------|\n| **VoiceOS** | Voice-first Android accessibility service | Android | Kotlin, Compose, Accessibility API |\n| **AVA** | AI assistant platform | Cross-platform | KMP, Kotlin, Swift, React |\n| **WebAvanue** | Web dashboard and management | Web | React, TypeScript, Tailwind |\n| **Cockpit** | Centralized module management | Cross-platform | Kotlin, Configuration Management |\n| **NLU** | Natural language understanding | Service | Python, ML Models, Kotlin |\n| **Common** | Shared utilities and libraries | All | Kotlin, Core Utils |\n\n---\n\n## Communication Patterns\n\n### IPC (Inter-Process Communication)\n\n**VoiceOS  AVA:**\n- Voice commands from VoiceOS\n- Assistant responses to VoiceOS\n- Intent-based communication\n\n**AVA  NLU:**\n- Text input for processing\n- Intent and entity extraction\n- Context management\n\n**Cockpit  All Modules:**\n- Configuration updates\n- Status monitoring\n- Health checks\n\n### API Contracts\n\nSee: `docs/project-info/API-CONTRACTS.md` for detailed API specifications\n\n---\n\n## Data Flow\n\n```\nUser Voice Input  VoiceOS  NLU  Intent/Entity\n                                \n                              AVA (Processing)\n                                \n                    Response  VoiceOS  Audio Output\n```\n\n---\n\n## Technology Stack\n\n### Frontend\n- **Android:** Jetpack Compose, Material Design 3\n- **iOS:** SwiftUI (planned)\n- **Web:** React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS\n\n### Backend\n- **Business Logic:** Kotlin Multiplatform\n- **ML/NLU:** Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch\n- **Database:** SQLDelight (KMP), Room (Android)\n\n### Infrastructure\n- **Build:** Gradle (Kotlin DSL)\n- **CI/CD:** (To be defined)\n- **Configuration:** IDC Format (v12.0.0)\n\n---\n\n## Configuration Management\n\nAll modules use **IDC (IDEACODE Configuration)** format:\n- 60-80% smaller than YAML\n- Faster parsing\n- Human-readable\n\nExample:\n```\nPRJ:nav:NewAvanues:monorepo:12.0.0\nCFG:voice_first:true:bool\nMOD:VoiceOS:Modules/VoiceOS:active\n```\n\n---\n\n## Quality Gates\n\n| Metric | Target | Status |\n|--------|--------|--------|\n| Test Coverage | 90%+ |  Target |\n| API Documentation | 100% |  Target |\n| IPC Coverage | 100% |  Target |\n| Intent Registration | 100% |  Target |\n\n---\n\n## Development Workflow\n\n1. **Branch Strategy:** Module-specific development branches\n   - `VoiceOS-Development`\n   - `AVA-Development`\n   - `WebAvanue-Development`\n   - `Cockpit-Development`\n   - `NLU-Development`\n\n2. **Integration:** Feature branches from development branches\n\n3. **Release:** Merge to `main` after
